name: Today Mr. Nobody Dies
description:
In  this game, 2 players play against each other; one takes the role of Mr. Nobody trying to avoid the constant threats the other player puts into the map in real time in order to survive until the time limit is over.

This game was designed for the Mr. Nobody player to use a controller and the other player to use keyboard and mouse.

This project was made during the 48h of Semcomp Game Jam in São Carlos - SP, Brasil. Also our entry for Ludum Dare 42. A crossover between the themes "Today Nobody Dies" and "Running Out of Space".
